sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import {Pie} from 'react-chartjs-2'; import {Line} from 'react-chartjs-2'; import useAuthStore from "../stores/authStore"; function Home() { const user :any = useAuthStore((state) => state.currentUser); const data = { labels: [ 'Red', 'Blue', 'Yellow' ], datasets: [{ data: [300, 50, 100], backgroundColor: [ '#0A54A2', '#5ECDD4', '#F005CB' ], hoverBackgroundColor: [ '#083a6f', '#1d6469', '#92067c' ] }] }; const Linedata = { labels: ['January', 'February', 'March', 'April', 'May', 'June', 'July'], datasets: [ { label: "", fill: false, lineTension: 0.1, backgroundColor: 'rgba(75,192,192,0.4)', borderColor: '#0770B0', borderCapStyle: 'butt', borderDash: [], borderDashOffset: 0.0, borderJoinStyle: 'miter', pointBorderColor: '#0770B0', pointBackgroundColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 1, pointHoverRadius: 5, pointHoverBackgroundColor: 'rgba(75,192,192,1)', pointHoverBorderColor: 'rgba(220,220,220,1)', pointHoverBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 1, pointHitRadius: 10, data: [65, 59, 80, 81, 56, 55, 40] } ] }; return ( <> {/* Mobile View */}

Hello, {user && user.firstName}!

Recent Loan Activity

Loan Amount

0

Monthly Repayment

0

Next Repayment

0


Your Next 10 Repayments


S/N Amount Due Date Status
1 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Paid
2 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Unpaid
3 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Paid
4 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Paid
5 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Unpaid
6 N14,000 May 29, 2020 Paid



{/* End of Mobile View */} {/* Desktop view */}

Recent Loan Activity:


Loan Amount

₦0.00

Monthly Repayment

₦0.00

Next Repayment

Not yet




Repayment Trend


Loans



{/* End of Desktop View */} ); } export default Home;
